trans-unit.source: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que una propiedad adjunta es examinable solo para los elementos que se derivan de un tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
trans-unit.target: El significado del término `browsable` tal y como se usa en las descripciones de este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] es análogo a las descripciones dadas para <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, pero el estado de exploración para una propiedad adjunta es especialmente relevante para información sobre propiedades de para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], dado que una propiedad adjunta es principalmente un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concepto.

trans-unit.source: If more than one type is specified for a <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], the property is browsable if any specified type matches (logical or).
trans-unit.target: Si se especifica más de un tipo para una <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], la propiedad es examinable si coincide cualquier tipo especificado (lógico o).

trans-unit.source: The type can also be an interface.
trans-unit.target: El tipo también puede ser una interfaz.

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A> `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] especifica <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A> `true`.

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions.
trans-unit.target: Esto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] solo se debe aplicar en el descriptor de acceso get de las definiciones de propiedad adjunta.

trans-unit.source: Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor.
trans-unit.target: No se aplican a este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] para el descriptor de acceso.

trans-unit.source: Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
trans-unit.target: Aunque intuitivamente es la operación de establecimiento es explorable para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] en los elementos relevantes, es la presencia y las características del descriptor de acceso get en la propiedad que define el elemento que controla el comportamiento real.

trans-unit.source: For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información general sobre las propiedades adjuntas declarativo, consulte [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The intended type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.
trans-unit.target: Tipo deseado que establece un ámbito de uso de la propiedad adjunta en la que se aplica este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> class, using the provided <paramref name="targetType" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> con el <paramref name="targetType" /> proporcionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> que se va a comparar con el <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina si el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] de <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> actual es igual a un objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> especificado es igual al objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> actual; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementación admite la igualdad de valor de un posible valor configurable expuesto por este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el código hash del atributo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] de <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: An unsigned 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: Valor entero de 32 bits sin signo.

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementación admite varios posibles valores hash basados en el posible valor configurable expuesto por este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the base type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el tipo base que abarca el uso de la propiedad adjunta donde se aplica [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The requested <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> solicitado.

trans-unit.source: This property is settable only via the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaration as exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es configurable solo mediante la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaración tal y como se expone el <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> constructor.

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique type identifier for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un identificador de tipo único para este [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] de <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that is a unique identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que es un identificador único de <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns a unique value for each [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], which is necessary because this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] allows multiple usages.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementación devuelve un valor único para cada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], que es necesario porque esto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] permite varios usos.
